definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: Mr. Jiang Xingfa, a famous Beijing Opera actor, is invited to give us an introduction to the art of Beijing opera.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请到著名京剧演员姜兴发老师讲授京剧艺术。

sentences.english: Logic is taught here as a separate subject.
sentences.chinese: 逻辑学在这里是作为单独一门课来讲授的。

sentences.english: Traditional teaching to lecture-based, non-simulation exercises before surgery.
sentences.chinese: 传统教学以讲授为主，不予术前模拟练习。

sentences.english: Wangchuyi should have more of the Sejong taught at the invitation of the palace Road school.
sentences.chinese: 王处一更曾应金世宗的邀请进宫讲授道学。

sentences.english: Conclusions The contents of HIV/AIDS prevention education by schoolteachers are not comprehensive.
sentences.chinese: 结论学校教师讲授预防艾滋病知识内容不够全面。

sentences.english: Such Biblical references are a valuable working-tool in catechesis.
sentences.chinese: 圣经的引述是教理讲授的工具之一。

sentences.english: One of his jobs is to visit schools and teach about bereavement.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作之一是拜访学校，讲授有关丧亲的内容。

sentences.english: Guidance director Lin Hsien-mu teaches the children Paiwan customs and traditions.
sentences.chinese: 教导主任林仙木经常讲授排湾族的文化与传统。

sentences.english: The course is delivered by experienced industrial trainer and in Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 本课程由企业培训师讲授，授课语言为中文。

sentences.english: Of course! I am British , the university teacher of British language literature in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我是英国人，在南京高校讲授英国语言文学。

sentences.english: Mechanics is taught by Prof. Wang.
This course will be taught and discussed in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 教课方式分十八周以课堂讲授及讨论为主。

sentences.english: He was invited to lecture on American literature at our college.
sentences.chinese: 他被请到我们学院讲授美国文学。

sentences.english: When I was about 14, a woman came to our school to talk about self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 在我大概十四岁时，一位女士来我们学校讲授防身术。
讲授法，讨论，团体合作学习。

sentences.english: The course is delivered by experienced industrial trainer and in English language.
sentences.chinese: 本课程由企业培训师讲授，授课语言为英文。

definition: to give a lecture/to lecture on
to explain a complicated subject matter in simple terms (idiom)/(of language) simple and easy to understand
to begin a lecture/to start on a story
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
